1.title: Early Games

episode of.title: Baby Playpen: Intro to Color, Movement & Games (TV Series 2012– )

1.plot: Join in the fun as Peekaboo hides behind a watermelon, Bloop & Loop discover a bell shape and Rainbow Horse colors an umbrella.

2.title: Magical Journey

episode of.title: Baby Playpen: Intro to Color, Movement & Games (TV Series 2012– )

2.plot: Today's journey is full of discoveries including a puzzle of an apple and a balloon creation of a parrot.

3.title: The Beginning

episode of.title: Baby Playpen: Intro to Color, Movement & Games (TV Series 2012– )

3.plot: Watch with your child and help point out the giraffes in Wonder Box and the horse in Peekaboo, I See You!

4.title: Colorful Motions

episode of.title: Baby Playpen: Intro to Color, Movement & Games (TV Series 2012– )

4.plot: Join in the fun as Peekaboo hides behind a tree, Bloop & Loop discover the shape of a sock and Rainbow Horse colors a rooster.

5.title: Motion & Sound

episode of.title: Baby Playpen: Intro to Color, Movement & Games (TV Series 2012– )

5.plot: Today's journey is full of discoveries including a puzzle of a caterpillar and a balloon creation of a dog.

6.title: Early Explorations

episode of.title: Baby Playpen: Intro to Color, Movement & Games (TV Series 2012– )

6.plot: Watch with your child and help point out the ragdoll in Wonder Box and the castle in Peekaboo, I See You!

imdb.title: Baby Playpen: Intro to Color, Movement & Games
akas: Baby Playpen: Intro to Color, Movement & Games (United States)
plot: Baby Playpen has been specifically designed for the attention span, visual capabilities and thought processes of your baby. Join some of the beloved characters of BabyFirst as children are introduced to the world around them.
